pages.title: Wine Racks do work as Storage for Wine Bottles.$(br)Stored Wine will also age when placed inside a Wine Rack.$(br)Please note that not every Wine will fit into these Wine Racks due of their size

pages.text: Wine Bottles can be placed at any free slot.$(br)Right-Click when holding a Wine Bottle to place it.$(br)Shift-Right-Click when having an empty Hand to take it out again.
